text: The Battle of the Dnieper involved about four million troups (Soviet and German). They fought over land and the Dnieper River totalling 870 miles for four months. Soviet army won. == Notes and References == Category:1943 in Europe Category:Battles involving Germany Category:Battles involving the Soviet Union Category:1940s in the Soviet Union Category:European battles of World War II Category:20th century in Belarus Category:1940s in Ukraine Category:Military of Ukraine
title: Battle of the Dnieper
